title: I have a problem
body: Everytime a league game starts, my laptop just go off wth

replies.body: It sounds like your PC is having a critical issue, causing it to shut down as a safety precaution.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will be happy to help find out what's going wrong.  We'll respond asap!
